transform_def.name: designed16
transform_def.string: let r = 1 / length(p_in) s = sin(length(p_in) + cos(p_in.y)) z = s * tan(p_in.x * sin(p_in.y * exp(abs(p_in.x / if r > s then twopi() * p_in.x else s * fourpi())))) con1 = abs(z) < r con2 = abs(z) > r in (if if fill > 0.0 then con1 else con2 then p_in else vec2(0.0)) * weight
